analysis: Market analysis indicates positive momentum favoring buyers. RSI at 16.39 signals oversold conditions, potential reversal opportunity. Money Flow Index at 18.69 shows extreme selling pressure. MACD histogram negative with bearish crossover in effect. Price trading below Bollinger lower band, indicating potential oversold bounce. Technical structure favors downside with price below key support levels. Ichimoku structure confirms bearish environment.
